patch.description: Update an instance of 'ItemImages' with an image of multipart/form-data format and with the specified id.

get.description: Retrieve all or some selected properties from an instance of 'ItemImages' with the given id.

delete.description: Delete an instance of 'ItemImages' with the specified id.

info.title: Swagger For Service Layer

tags.name: ItemImages
tags.description: This entity enables you to manipulate 'ItemImages'. It is a stream entity and relies on the entity 'Item'.
